I wish more people who want to play the game competitively would play. I don't think the community is very friendly to new comers but there are exceptions. The number of hackers is kind of ridiculous when you go on Overwatch, but when you get prime its ok. There is a skill curve to this game so brace yourself if you think you are good at shooters. I do believe that in the right conditions(cooperative team, communication, 128tick, no lag, and same applied to the enemy team with equal skill) this game can be extremely rewarding and fun.
